# speechSynthesizer(_:didFinish:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the synthesizer finishes speaking an utterance.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func speechSynthesizer(_ synthesizer: AVSpeechSynthesizer, didFinish utterance: AVSpeechUtterance)
```

## Parameters

- **synthesizer**: The speech synthesizer that finishes speaking the utterance.
- **utterance**: The utterance that the speech synthesizer finishes speaking.

## Discussion

The system ignores the final utterance’s [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechUtterance/postUtteranceDelay] and calls this method immediately when speech ends.

## Responding to speech synthesis events

- **speechSynthesizer(_:didStart:)**: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer begins speaking an utterance.
- **speechSynthesizer(_:willSpeakRangeOfSpeechString:utterance:)**: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer is about to speak a portion of an utterance’s text.
- **speechSynthesizer(_:willSpeak:utterance:)**: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer is about to speak a marker of an utterance’s text.
- **speechSynthesizer(_:didPause:)**: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer pauses while speaking an utterance.
- **speechSynthesizer(_:didContinue:)**: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer resumes speaking an utterance after pausing.
- **speechSynthesizer(_:didCancel:)**: Tells the delegate when the synthesizer cancels speaking an utterance.
